org.cripac.isee.vpe.common

Class Topic

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cripac.isee.vpe.common.Topic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class Topic
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Topic class is a wrapper for Kafka topics with additional information.

    Created by ken.yu on 16-10-5.

    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • Topic

        public Topic(@Nonnull
             java.lang.String name,
             @Nonnull
             DataType type,
             @Nullable
             Stream.Info streamInfo)
        Create a topic.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the topic to appear in Kafka.
        type - Type of the topic used within the system.
        streamInfo - Information of stream this topic belongs to. If set as null, the topic is dangling from any streams, which is only used within external tests.
